Never in my life have i experienced a game that brought me back to my time in Iraq. I havent been able to taste  the feeling of blowing the craniums off sand ni****s since 2008 in vietnam, but let me tell you that beast inside of me has been revived. Though every time i spawn as a terrosit i team kill all my teamates because i will not let any stupid ass jawa kill innocent hard working american soldiers, even in a video game. But beside that the game is flawless, it puts you in the scenerio of watching your loved friends have they fucking heads blown off by a 12 year old, just like in Iraq.
